concept.shortdesc: This topic describes about Gmail account.

conbody.p: Gmail is a free email service provided by Google. In many ways, Gmail is like any other email service, you can send and receive emails, block spam, create an address book, and perform other basic email tasks. But it is also has some more unique features that help make it one of the most popular online email services.
